original: Anupādinnaṁ kusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naupādinno nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Hetuyā ekaṁ …pe… avigate ekaṁ.
analyzed: anupādinnam kusalam dhammam paṭicca na aupādinnaḥ na kusalaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā hetuyā ekam pe avigate eka

original: Anupādinnaṁ akusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naupādinno naakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Hetuyā ekaṁ …pe… avigate ekaṁ. (Abyākatamūlaṁ ekaṁyeva paccayavasena.)
analyzed: anupādinnam akusalam dhammam paṭicca na upādinnaḥ na akusalaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā hetuyā ekam pe avigate eka abyākata mūlam ekayā iva paccaya vasena
